title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 248-9.1 - Right of entry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 248-9.1 - Right of entry

State Regulations

For the purpose of inspecting vehicle and equipment and
related records to determine compliance with this Part, the department or an
authorized representative has the right to enter any facility (with any
necessary safety clearances for off road sites) where vehicles and equipment
are located or related records are kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
248-9.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
